__e: Why didn't you have the decency to come tell me that five weeks ago?
Don't be naive. What I'm trying to teach you is that dignity and decency is not for sale.
So out of decency and respect, I just wanted to let you know that you're gonna have a blood child in the world.
And after it was all done, this vampire didn't even have the decency to leave. No, no, no.
I wasn't even polite enough to ask you what you were doing here.
I'm just... I'm asking to have the decency to let me try.
And you should have the decency to quit too.
Then someone ought to have the decency to bring him to justice.
Which is fine, but he could have at least the decency to tell me to my face.
